[event]
# Teleport to Laurelia
type=on_trigger
location=11,31,6,1
intermap=laurelia.txt,91,2

[event]
# Fairy Flower
type=run_once
location=14,15,1,2
hotspot=location
loot=199,14,16,fixed,1
requires_not_status=flowerfound
requires_status=elderintro
tooltip=Fairy Flower

[event]
# Teleport to Cavern
type=on_trigger
location=14,12,2,2
intermap=cavern.txt,61,36
requires_status=cavernexplored
